mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address( road_address, jibun_address, detail_address, postcode ) VALUES ( #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{postcode} )

INSERT INTO customer( customer_no, address_no, customer_id, customer_pw, customer_name, customer_birth, customer_gender, customer_email, customer_phone, customer_type ) VALUES ( #{customerNo}, #{addressNo}, #{customerId}, #{customerPw}, #{customerName}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerGender}, #{customerEmail}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerType} )
mapper.select: SELECT customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_name as customerName, customer_type as customerType, customer_email as customerEmail FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = #{customerPw}

SELECT customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_birth as customerBirth, customer_gender as customerGender, customer_email as customerEmail, customer_phone as customerPhone, customer_type as customerType FROM customer WHERE customer_no = #{String}
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM ( select customer_id from customer union all select customer_id from del_customer) as a WHERE a.customer_id = #{customerId}
